primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To withdraw cryptocurrency from your Ndax account using the desktop website, follow these steps:

  1. Log in at ndax.io and go to your Dashboard.
  2. Click Wallet in the left-hand sidebar.
  3. Select the cryptocurrency you want to withdraw.
  4. Click Send at the bottom of the screen.
  5. Choose the network you want to use.
  6. Enter the destination wallet address and the amount you want to send.
  7. If you're withdrawing XRP, XLM, EOS, LUNC, or Hedera, enter the required destination tag or memo ID.

⚠️ Important:
If a destination tag or memo is required, you must include it.
Failing to do so may result in a loss of funds or delays in processing your withdrawal.
Only check the ‘No Memo’ box if you are sending to a private wallet that does not require one.
Most exchanges do require a destination tag or memo.

  1. Read and agree to the disclaimer, then click Send.
  2. Enter the six-digit 2FA code from your authenticator app.
  3. Confirm the withdrawal by clicking the confirmation link sent to your email.
